abstract: The company wants the Xbox 360 game console to become a gateway for movies, television and social networking.
snippet: The company wants the Xbox 360 game console to become a gateway for movies, television and social networking.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  Reaching out beyond hardcore video game players to everyday consumers, Microsoft outlined an entertainment strategy on Monday for making the company’s Xbox 360 game console a gateway for movies, television and social networking.

headline.main: Microsoft Reveals New Strategy for Xbox
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Reveals New Strategy for Xbox
